biotools.summary: MFEprimer-2.0 webserver tool evaluates the specificity of PCR primers. It allows users to check primer specificity against genomic DNA and mRNA/cDNA sequence databases. Important characteristics such as sequence, melting temperature and size of amplicon are reported on.
